thread.section_title: The London NYC - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent Hotel
thread.title_full: Excellent Hotel - Review of The London NYC, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: joecdlittle
title: Excellent Hotel
text: Not sure why reviews were less than above average for this hotel. I have stayed at the LA London as well and found the NYC location to be very nice. The rooms are excellent and way above average for a NYC hotel room - trust me I've stayed in many. I thought the lobby, views, service and cleanliness were very good, especially for the price. The hotel is in a great location as well. No issues with the HVAC although it did take a while to heat up but ultimately did. I would highly recommend this hotel if you are particular or desire a high-end stay.
